description: Lancashire batter Rob Jones joins Worcestershire on loan for One-Day Cup ahead of permanent switch in 2024.
title: Rob Jones: Worcestershire sign batter on loan for One-Day Cup
title_page: Rob Jones: Worcestershire sign batter on loan for One-Day Cup - BBC Sport
maintext:
Worcestershire have signed Lancashire batter Rob Jones on loan for the One-Day Cup campaign.
The 27-year-old had already agreed a contract at New Road from 2024 after rejecting a new deal at Old Trafford.
"It's a great opportunity for Rob to get to know his new team-mates and coaches before joining us permanently," said, external Worcestershire CEO Ashley Giles.
Jones will be available to represent Worcestershire in the national counties fixture against Shropshire on Sunday.
Giles added: "We are thrilled to have Rob on board for the Metro Bank One-Day Cup ahead of his permanent move. His inclusion will undoubtedly strengthen our batting line-up, and we believe he will make a substantial impact."
Jones made his first-class debut for Lancashire in 2016 and has made 109 appearances in all formats for the club.
